short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Google Chorome Extension for tOOns MaG readers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
tOOns MaG is the world's first online cartoon magazine. tOOns MaG is published in five different languages; English, Bengali, Arabic, Spanish and Hindi. More then 2000 cartoonist and writers are contributing in tOOns MaG. As an online cartoon magazine tOOns MaG has been founded by ARIFUR RAHMAN on 1st of November 2009 in Bangladesh. From December 2010, tOOns MaG has been reorganized in Norway.

Mission
tOOns MaG believes in FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION. Our mission is to establish FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION all over the world through cartoons, and promote cartoons and cartoonists.

This is a tOOns MaG Extension for Google Chrome Browser.
By using this extension you can get new cartoon, comic, news and updates.
